title: ServiceElement
description: Booking data for a booking element

valueDefinition.description: Definition of the element. Format: [Description; Supplement] Supplement is only used for the selectList and contains a comma separated list of list entries

descriptionText.description: Description text which explains the expected input to the customer

editable.description: Defines whether the field is editable or not

contentCategory.description: Category for the enrichment with user/session specific values (e.g. firstName, FamilyName, fullName, street, ...)

contentKey.description: Modification key for the content category (e.g. departure: the departure time of a flight is used as enrichment value

contentValue.description: Modifier for the content key (e.g. for departure, a value of -60 means 60 minutes prior to departure time, for Term and Condition a uri to them

mandatory.description: Defines whether the element is mandatory or not
